content: "There seems to be a mistake in the provided code snippet. The variable `i` is not defined in the while loop where it is used. Assuming that `i` should be the same as `f` in the context of a selection sort algorithm, and correcting the loop to decrement `f` instead of using an undefined `i`, the loop invariant for the i-th (or in this case, f-th) iteration could be:\n\n\"arr[f->len(arr)-1] is sorted\""
